sentences.english: Where do the Mäkeläs eat lunch?
The Mäkeläs eat lunch in the kitchen.
What is the man doing in the yard?

sentences.finnish: Hän nostaa monta ruskea laatikkoa autosta.
sentences.english: He is lifting many brown boxes from the car.

sentences.finnish: Miksi Emma ja Kalle menevät ulos?
sentences.english: Why are Emma and Kalle going outside?

sentences.finnish: Koska he haluavat nähdä, mitä pihalla tapahtuu.
sentences.english: Because they want to see what is happening in the yard.
He is carrying the chairs upstairs.

sentences.finnish: Ei, asunnon ovi ei ole auki mutta hänen tyttöystävä on kotona.
sentences.english: No, the apartment door is not open but his girlfriend is at home.
